lifeEvents.content:
Sr. Software Engineer at
the University of Cambridge

Developer at Nomensa, Bristol
Built an eLearning platform for the NHS & maintained solutions for the energy, healthcare, and charity sectors.

BA (Hons) Linguistics & English Lit. (1st)
University of Manchester
Wrote my dissertation on paraphrasing verbal metonymy through computational methods, supported by an AWS Educate grant.

Computational Linguistics (Dean's List)
University of Massachusetts, Amherst (USA)
Upskilled in Natural Language Processing, attended hackathons, took in American culture.
